text: The Bubble Nebula in Barnard's Galaxy has the official designation of Hubble 1925 I as it was the first (Roman numeral 1) object recorded in a paper by . It includes areas of bright H II emission. It is located north-west of the larger Hubble 1925 III. ==See also== * Ring Nebula (NGC 6822) == Notes == == References == * * * * * ==External links== * Category:H II regions Category:Sagittarius (constellation) Category:NGC 6822
title: Bubble Nebula (NGC 6822)
